lenders.occupational_info:
In spring 2009 me and my husband Frans have successfully  trained NLP, Non-Violent Communication and Family Constellations in KABUL -Afghanistan as peacebuilding.

The trainings were for 2 different groups: 
* 12 illiterate widows and their 42 children who live in a shelter. They have now more selfesteem and mre problemsolving qualities. 
* A train-the-trainer training was for 18 highly educated and dedicated women and men of the Afghan Womens Network.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because:
Hey. I'm Craig. Having been lucky enough to do some volunteer work overseas in a few countries I have seen what a massive difference microloans make. Every loan not only impacts an individual, but their family and community too. At the risk of sounding like an advertorial, I just think Kiva is such a clever initiative. 

I once asked a very wise old philanthropist in Sri Lanka, an ex high school teacher who ended up heading a NGO with asssitance in over 10,000 villages, "But there are so many problems in the world. What can one individual do?"

He said, "Something. Anything."

:)

lenders.loan_because: i think we all should be cooperating for a better world and for a better life. Giving a little from what we have may benefit us all..

lenders.name: Vincent

lenders.loan_because: it is our obligation in this world to share.

lenders.name: Raymond S. Badarzynski Memorial Fund
lenders.loan_because: This fund is in memory of Uncle Ray - a person that stands out in my memory as always willing to lend a helping hand, a smile and a brighter day to anyone in need. It is our hope that others around the world can help achieve their hopes and dreams with a little help from the memory of Uncle Ray. All monies in this account will be donated to stroke research at the closing of this KIVA account - hopefully a few years from now...

lenders.occupational_info: Our goal is to develop, demonstrate and implement a model ecologically sustainable village that can serve as the template for growth in the developing nations.
